name: ASKfm Lite - fast & anonymous, social Q&A network
description: If you have never heard about ASKfm before, it is better for you to check the full app first. We are sure, Q&A world will surprise you! If you have already known about ASKfm, then meet ASKfm Lite! We made it to support your curiosity!  ASKfm Lite vs ASKfm: - Light as a touch of the Sun on the first spring day! We decreased the original size of ASKfm to save more free space on your device. Enjoy! - Faster than lightning! Cache use was reduced, so ASKfm Lite flies like a rocket. Hold tightly!. Hold tightly! - Does Not take part in the Hungry Games! Low Internet and battery consumption. Stay alive longer. - Powerful as its big brother. All main functions of ASKfm are available. Keep asking and answering! Thats all you need, isnt it? - Trustworthy. There is no need to worry about your safety. We still care of your confidentiality so keep revealing your friends secrets as well as your own. What are you waiting for?  ASKfm lite includes:  - Questions  ask anonymously or openly your friends, classmates or strangers. - Answers  answer any question you got or dont answer, if you are not ready to open your secret :wink: - Answer threads  create anonymous chat threads or learn all details openly under the answer. - Anonymity  it is still your own choice to be an anonym or unmask yourself. - Security  safe sharing of your thoughts and opinion. - Photo polls  create photo polls to learn your friends opinion. - Shoutout  ask questions to people around to learn something ASAP.  Find the full ASKfm app here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.askfm  Have questions? Write us at ASKfm: www.ask.fm/askfm  Follow us on: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/askfm/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/askfmpage Twitter: https://twitter.com/askfm VKontakte: https://vk.com/askfm
